Package org.dsa.iot.dslink.connection

Handles connecting to remote endpoints and servers.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    MessageTracker
    Keeps track of outgoing message IDs and incoming acks from and to the network.
    NetworkClient
    Handles writing and closing connections.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ConnectionManager  
    ConnectionManager.Client  
    DataHandler
    Handles all incoming and outgoing data in a network endpoint.
    DataHandler.DataReceived  
    QueuedWriteManager  
    RemoteEndpoint
    Common interface for handling remote endpoints.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ConnectionType
    Connection type used in a configuration

Package org.dsa.iot.dslink.connection Description

Handles connecting to remote endpoints and servers. The handshake package is used for handling handshakes and authentication to remote endpoints. A successful handshake is necessary before the connection can proceed. Otherwise the client will be rejected.
